item.title: Wtf is wrong with this shit
item.dc:creator: @weihoppa2 weihoppa2
item.description:
@weihoppa2 wrote:

[quote=“Envion, post:20, topic:190911”][quote author=Shogunreaper link=topic=254469.msg2121508#msg2121508 date=1205987915]

Like i care about respect comming from a 13 year old.

Eww lowblow…

Like no-one has heard that one before… GEEZ Think up a couple-a new disses pl0x?

How about all 4 of you inbreds get off my thread if you can’t help your just a waste of time.
[/quote]

Anyone insolent enough to confuse “your” and “you’re” while calling someone an idiot probably shouldn’t be near a computer, let alone attempt programming.[/quote]Dude, he ment to say you![quote=“n0va k0, post:18, topic:190911”]Aight, We’ll get off, but trust me, NO ONE will help a lowlife that expects to get an answer to a question like that, flaming us

Like m,i,k,e, would say, lulz own3d <<< narb[/quote]YOU began to insult him, therefore you flamed him. ALSO, the link is broken. Or it may be just because of our NEW versions of comps. use a whole new linking system… trust me, i know about computers, but not programming so much =[

item.title: Wtf is wrong with this shit
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

public void Poison() {
if(PoisonDelay <= 1)
{
poisondmg = true;
newhptype = true;
hptype = 2;
hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(5);
sendMessage(“You start to die of poison”);
PoisonDelay = 40;
playerLevel[3] -= hitDiff;
updateRequired = true;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
inCombat();
PoisonClear++;
poisondmg = false;
} else {
poisondmg = false;
}
}

Against my better judgement - haven’t played with these servers in a while, but it seems “poisondmg” dictates whether our damage blurb is poison’s type or not?

Read full topic
